title: Video Game Voice Actors Go On Strike - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.26.24
description:
Head over to KindaFunny.com/store to pick up something from the new line of Portillo merch!

Video game actors go on strike, Bioshock’s movie is still coming but with a lower budget, and Legacy of Kain remasters have been spotted.

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
GAMESCAST - Our Call of Duty Warzone 2024 review
After that is Game Showdown
The STREAM is Marvel Rivals
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
You can get today’s Gregway
And you can get The July Patreon Happy Hour this afternoon if you’re a $25 supporter.
If you’re down in San Diego tonight, head over to Quantum Brewery at 7:30pm to have a beer and see Nick do more comedy! tickets at kindafunny.com/sdcc
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Karl Jacobs & Delaney Twining

00:00:00 - Start
00:09:30 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:11:45 - Video Game Actors Are Going On Strike Over AI - Ethan Gach @ Kotaku
00:30:07 - The BioShock movie is still in the works with a reduced budget - Adam B. Vary @ Variety
00:36:50 - Legacy of Kain remasters have been spotted at Comic-Con - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:42:38 - Coral Island developer blames Humble Games layoffs for leaving Switch port "in a place of uncertainty" - Ed Nightingale @ Eurogamer
00:46:50 - Marvel Rivals SDCC Trailers!
00:52:30 - Wee News!
00:56:14 - SuperChats


The Kinda Funny Membership gets you Ad-Free and Exclusive Shows: https://www.youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames/join
http://www.patreon.com/KindaFunny

Merch: http://www.kindafunny.com/store 

Gamescast Background Art by https://twitter.com/Orioto
In Review Intro Videos by: https://twitter.com/CameronKen
In Review Intro Music by: https://twitter.com/CarterHarrell

Listen To Our Podcasts On Your Favorite Podcast Service:
Kinda Funny Games Daily: https://bit.ly/2T3Y3rS
Kinda Funny Gamescast: https://bit.ly/3wBgRwg
The Kinda Funny Podcast: https://bit.ly/3wA9GVo
In Review – Movies Ranked, Reviewed, & Recapped: https://bit.ly/2VAgdT7
PS I Love You XOXO – A PlayStation Podcast: https://bit.ly/3r3rjvB
Kinda Funny Xcast – An Xbox Podcast: https://bit.ly/36twqvD
Kinda Funny Screencast – TV & Movie Reviews Podcast: https://bit.ly/3e7yQ75

Follow The Kinda Funny Team:

Tim Gettys: https://twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick Scarpino: https://twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Andy Cortez: https://twitter.com/TheAndyCortez
Blessing Adeoye: https://twitter.com/BlessingJr

Joey Noelle: https://twitter.com/joeynoelle
Barrett Courtney: https://twitter.com/SadBoyBarrett
